Frequently Asked Questions

  1. Can the plugin automatically download and use the required version of protoc?
Can the plugin automatically download and use the required version of protoc?
Protocol Buffer Compiler is a native application and is distributed as a binary executable file. For the time being, it is not distributed via Maven repository (and unlikely that it will ever be). Therefore the application developer will need to configure protoc executable location for the plugin, either explicitly with protocExecutable plugin configuration parameter, or, preferably, by using protobuf toolchain.
